nodes.excerpt: Open Design is the first developer toolkit to read, change, and display data from design files 📤 Process any Figma, Sketch, PSD, AI, or XD file via API 📥 Get design data in a unified JSON format 🛠 Build automations and tools to improve design workflows
nodes.title: Open Design - Dev toolkit to read, change & display data from design files
nodes.author: Tristan Pollock

localize.description: Open Design是第一个从设计文件中读取、更改和显示数据的开发者工具包 📤 通过API处理任何Figma、Sketch、PSD、AI或XD文件 📥 以统一的JSON格式获取设计数据 🛠 构建自动化和工具以改善设计工作流程。
localize.tagline: 从设计文件中读取、更改和显示数据的开发工具包。

localize.description: Open Design是第一個從設計文件中讀取、更改和顯示數據的開發者工具包 📤 通過API處理任何Figma、Sketch、PSD、AI或XD文件 📥 以統一的JSON格式獲取設計數據 🛠 構建自動化和工具以改善設計工作流程。
localize.tagline: 從設計文件中讀取、更改和顯示數據的開發工具包。

nodes.excerpt: http://blocks.wickedtemplates.com/ are an open source collection of layout blocks and components built with Tailwind CSS V2 ready to copy-paste on your Tailwind project.

nodes.author: ᴍɪᴄʜᴀᴇʟ ᴀɴᴅʀᴇᴜᴢᴢᴀ

localize.description: http://blocks.wickedtemplates.com/ 是一个开放源码的布局块和组件集合，用Tailwind CSS V2构建，准备复制粘贴到您的Tailwind项目上。
localize.tagline: 尾风V2块准备复制粘贴

nodes.excerpt: Music Time is built on the Code Time plugin and performs machine learning against a range of music metrics plus productivity data from over 70,000 developers to determine song recommendations.
nodes.title: Music Time for Spotify - Discover the most productive music to listen to as you code.
nodes.author: Abdelilah Hicham

localize.description: Music Time建立在Code Time插件的基础上，针对一系列的音乐指标和来自7万多名开发者的生产力数据进行机器学习，以确定歌曲推荐。
localize.tagline: 发现最高效的音乐，让你在编码时听得津津有味。

localize.description: Music Time建立在Code Time插件的基礎上，針對一系列的音樂指標和來自7萬多名開發者的生產力數據進行機器學習，以確定歌曲推薦。
localize.tagline: 發現最高效的音樂，讓你在編碼時聽得津津有味。

nodes.excerpt: Website peace of mind. Haark keeps track of all of your websites and makes sure you’re the first to know if they’re down. Developers and project teams alike use Haark as their early warning system so they can be on their A-game with clients.
nodes.title: Haark - Monitors your sites and notifies you if they're down
nodes.author: Graeme White

localize.description: 网站安心。Haark跟踪你所有的网站，并确保你是第一个知道他们是否下降。开发人员和项目团队都使用Haark作为他们的早期预警系统，因此他们可以在他们的A-game与客户。
localize.tagline: 监控您的网站并在网站瘫痪时通知您。

localize.description: 網站安心。Haark跟蹤你所有的網站，並確保你是第一個知道他們是否下降。開發人員和項目團隊都使用Haark作爲他們的早期預警系統，因此他們可以在他們的A-game與客戶。
localize.tagline: 監控您的網站並在網站癱瘓時通知您。

nodes.excerpt: Ever wanted to show an onboarding without code? Show a marketing message on a click of button? Now you got pal.
nodes.title: Pal - No-code user onboarding for all your flutter apps
nodes.author: mcfly

localize.description: 有没有想在没有代码的情况下展示一个入职培训？点击按钮就能显示营销信息？现在你有了朋友。

nodes.excerpt: See an interesting 404 page every time you open a new tab, including the credits and the source code. A great source of inspiration for designers and developers.

nodes.excerpt: SwiftCV helps you to build a beautifully designed page for your online professional presence. Make it easy for your visitors to find everything about you in one place. Use code PRODHUNT to get 20% off exclusively For suggestions reach us at hello@swiftcv.com

nodes.excerpt: ❤️ Open source 🤖 Native 🔌 Plugin system ⌨️ Custom hotkeys ⬆️ Sort options by frequency of use 📦 Small size (less than 20mb) Spotter is a productivity tool, the main function is to search and launch applications actions and applications themselves.
nodes.title: Spotter - Productivity tool that allows you to launch everything
nodes.author: Denis

localize.description: ❤️开源 🤖原生 🔌插件系统 ⌨️自定义热键 ⬆️按使用频率排序选项 📦体积小(小于20mb)Spotter是一个生产力工具，主要功能是搜索和启动应用的动作和应用本身。
localize.tagline: 生产力工具，允许你启动一切

localize.description: ❤️開源 🤖原生 🔌插件系統 ⌨️自定義熱鍵 ⬆️按使用頻率排序選項 📦體積小(小於20mb)Spotter是一個生產力工具，主要功能是搜索和啓動應用的動作和應用本身。
localize.tagline: 生產力工具，允許你啓動一切

nodes.excerpt: 🚀 Codekeep lets you store and share bits of code and text with other users. Snippets can be organized into folders/labels for instant reuse. Create code screenshots and link it with codekeep.
nodes.title: CodeKeep - Organize, discover & share code snippets
nodes.author: JP1016

localize.description: 🚀 Codekeep 可以让你存储并与其他用户分享代码和文本片段。可以将代码片段组织到文件夹/标签中，以便即时重复使用。创建代码截图，并与codekeep链接。
localize.tagline: 组织、发现和共享代码片段

localize.description: 🚀 Codekeep 可以讓你存儲並與其他用戶分享代碼和文本片段。可以將代碼片段組織到文件夾/標籤中，以便即時重複使用。創建代碼截圖，並與codekeep鏈接。
localize.tagline: 組織、發現和共享代碼片段

nodes.excerpt: 🤔 Are you tired of constantly switching between your work apps on your browser/desktop? 😎 Hubblu is a distraction-free workspace having all your work apps in 1-place 🤑 Increase your productivity and save up to 40% more time cutting down on distractions
nodes.title: Hubblu - Distraction Free Workspace | All your Work Apps in 1-Place
nodes.author: Saimohit Sai

localize.description: 🤔 您是否厌倦了在浏览器/桌面上不断切换工作应用程序？😎 Hubblu是一个无干扰的工作空间，将您所有的工作应用程序集中在一个地方 🤑 提高您的生产力，并节省多达40％以上的时间，减少分心。

nodes.excerpt: Smooth Hand Mockup helps you showcase your apps and services properly with animated hand mockups. It is designed to make your videos self-explanatory and engaging.

nodes.excerpt: Drata saves companies hundreds of hours per year getting and staying SOC 2 compliant by continuously monitoring their security posture and automatically collecting evidence of their controls across AWS, GCP, GitHub, Jira, Gusto, G Suite, Office365 and more.
nodes.title: Drata - Put SOC 2 Compliance on Autopilot
nodes.author: Hiten Shah

localize.description: Drata通过持续监控其安全态势并自动收集AWS、GCP、GitHub、Jira、Gusto、G Suite、Office365等的控制证据，每年可为公司节省数百小时的时间，以获得并保持SOC 2合规性。
localize.tagline: 将SOC 2合规性置于自动驾驶状态

localize.description: Drata通過持續監控其安全態勢並自動收集AWS、GCP、GitHub、Jira、Gusto、G Suite、Office365等的控制證據，每年可爲公司節省數百小時的時間，以獲得並保持SOC 2合規性。
localize.tagline: 將SOC 2合規性置於自動駕駛狀態

nodes.excerpt: qr.eletto.dev is a simple QR code generator for developers. It can be used in any project to quickly generate QR codes. Instead of installing libraries into your project to generate QR codes, you can just use the URL as an image.
nodes.title: QR Code Generator For Developers - A quick API to generate QR codes in your apps
nodes.author: JohnAnthony Eletto

localize.description: qr.eletto.dev是一个简单的二维码生成器，适用于开发者。它可以用于任何项目中快速生成二维码。不需要在你的项目中安装库来生成二维码，你只需要使用URL作为图像即可。
localize.tagline: 在您的应用程序中生成QR码的快速API。

localize.description: qr.eletto.dev是一個簡單的二維碼生成器，適用於開發者。它可以用於任何項目中快速生成二維碼。不需要在你的項目中安裝庫來生成二維碼，你只需要使用URL作爲圖像即可。
localize.tagline: 在您的應用程序中生成QR碼的快速API。

nodes.excerpt: Think of Enlightn as your performance and security consultant. 120 automated checks that “review” your code, server configurations and more to provide actionable recommendations on improving your Laravel app’s performance and security.
nodes.title: Enlightn for Laravel - Personalized recommendations for improving your Laravel code
nodes.author: Miguel Piedrafita

localize.description: 将Enlightn视为您的性能和安全顾问。120项自动检查可以 "审查 "你的代码, 服务器配置和更多, 以提供可操作的建议来提高你的Laravel应用程序的性能和安全性.
localize.tagline: 个性化的建议来改善你的Laravel代码

localize.description: 將Enlightn視爲您的性能和安全顧問。120項自動檢查可以 "審查 "你的代碼, 服務器配置和更多, 以提供可操作的建議來提高你的Laravel應用程序的性能和安全性.
localize.tagline: 個性化的建議來改善你的Laravel代碼

nodes.excerpt: Control solves compliance with one integration. SOC2, ISO 27001, PCI & more. No more complex legalese, writing policies or manually running endless checks across your systems. Accelerate & automate your security program and SOC2 compliance for FREE today.
nodes.title: Control - Accelerate and automate security & SOC2 compliance for free
nodes.author: Hiten Shah

localize.description: 控制解决了一次集成的合规性。SOC2、ISO 27001、PCI等。不再需要复杂的法律条文、编写政策或在您的系统中手动运行无休止的检查。加速和自动化您的安全程序和SOC2合规性，今天免费。
localize.tagline: 免费加速和自动化安全和SOC2合规性。

localize.description: 控制解決了一次集成的合規性。SOC2、ISO 27001、PCI等。不再需要複雜的法律條文、編寫政策或在您的系統中手動運行無休止的檢查。加速和自動化您的安全程序和SOC2合規性，今天免費。
localize.tagline: 免費加速和自動化安全和SOC2合規性。

nodes.excerpt: Divjoy makes it ridiculously easy to start your next React project. Pick all the things you need in your codebase (UI kit, auth, database, payments, etc), choose a beautiful template, then export a complete React codebase. Everything just works 😻
nodes.title: Divjoy 2.0 - React codebase & UI generator
nodes.author: Gabe Ragland

localize.description: Divjoy 使得开始您的下一个 React 项目变得非常简单。在您的代码库中挑选您需要的所有东西（UI 工具包、认证、数据库、支付等），选择一个漂亮的模板，然后导出一个完整的 React 代码库。一切都能正常工作 😻。
localize.tagline: React代码库和UI生成器

localize.description: Divjoy 使得開始您的下一個 React 項目變得非常簡單。在您的代碼庫中挑選您需要的所有東西（UI 工具包、認證、數據庫、支付等），選擇一個漂亮的模板，然後導出一個完整的 React 代碼庫。一切都能正常工作 😻。
localize.tagline: React代碼庫和UI生成器

nodes.excerpt: Internal’s new enterprise-ready app builder includes a flexible drag-and-drop UI to build tools, powerful dev tools to connect to any API, and robust security options including permissioned data flows and SOC 2 certified cloud or on-premise hosting.

nodes.excerpt: Teamflow is a virtual office for your team to hang out. Bring back the camaraderie of being in the office, the energy of working in the same room, the spontaneity of hallway conversations. ⠀ The joy of feeling like a team again.
nodes.title: Teamflow - Feel like a team again with your own virtual office
nodes.author: Chris Messina

localize.description: Teamflow是一个虚拟的办公室，让你的团队在这里闲逛。让您重拾在办公室的情谊，重拾在同一房间工作的活力，重拾在走廊上交谈的自发性。⠀ 再次感受到团队的快乐。

nodes.excerpt: LT Browser is the perfect tool for designers, developers, and enthusiastic amateurs who want to create great-looking & well-performing responsive websites or web apps. Instantly View, Build, and Debug your website on 45+ mobile, tablet, & desktop viewports.
nodes.title: LT Browser - Next-gen browser to build, test & debug mobile websites
nodes.author: Kevin William David

localize.description: LT浏览器是设计师、开发人员和热心的业余爱好者想要创建外观漂亮、性能良好的响应式网站或网络应用的完美工具。在45个以上的移动、平板和桌面视口上即时查看、构建和调试你的网站。
localize.tagline: 用于构建、测试和调试移动网站的下一代浏览器。

localize.description: LT瀏覽器是設計師、開發人員和熱心的業餘愛好者想要創建外觀漂亮、性能良好的響應式網站或網絡應用的完美工具。在45個以上的移動、平板和桌面視口上即時查看、構建和調試你的網站。
localize.tagline: 用於構建、測試和調試移動網站的下一代瀏覽器。

nodes.excerpt: You can now speed up your workflow right from within your VS Code environment. Here are some key features of the plugin: - Preview Lottie files - Edit Lottie files - Search through animations on LottieFiles - Extract and view a dotLottie file and its contents
nodes.title: LottieFiles for VS Code - Speed up your Lottie workflow right from within VS Code
nodes.author: Jawish Hameed

localize.description: 现在，您可以直接从VS代码环境中加速您的工作流。以下是该插件的一些关键功能：-预览Lottie文件-编辑Lottie文件-搜索LottieFiles上的动画-提取并查看dotLottie文件及其内容
localize.tagline: 直接从VS代码中加速您的Lottie工作流

localize.description: 現在，您可以直接從VS代碼環境中加速您的工作流。以下是該插件的一些關鍵功能：-預覽Lottie文件-編輯Lottie文件-搜索LottieFiles上的動畫-提取並查看dotLottie文件及其內容
localize.tagline: 直接從VS代碼中加速您的Lottie工作流
